name: Green Thumb Roo
description:
Made for the GBJam 10

The plants have overrun the garden!  Grab your shears and get trimming!

X - Jump

Z - Use Item

TAB - Switch Items

ENTER - Pause

It's three stages long, with 10 diamonds hidden in each one for an extra challenge.

UPDATE - I've added a config program, so you can use custom/joypad controls, and adjust window size/palette.
